title: Who would be most likely to be interested

content.question: Which of the following persons would be most likely to be interested in the advertisement?

choices.label: Someone looking for brand-new kitchen appliances
Someone moving into his or her first apartment
Someone in need of computer accessories
Someone wanting to furnish a spare bedroom

content.answer: Someone moving into his or her first apartment
